page1.title: 魯道夫紅鼻子馴鹿
page1.story: 從前從前，有一隻可愛的小馴鹿叫做魯道夫。魯道夫和其他馴鹿不一樣，因為他有一個特別的紅鼻子，就像一盞小燈籠一樣閃閃發光。
page1.illustration_prompt: A cute baby reindeer with a bright glowing red nose, standing in a snowy forest, big innocent eyes, watercolor illustration style, soft colors, children's book art, magical atmosphere, Christmas theme

page2.title: 閃亮的紅鼻子
page2.story: 魯道夫的紅鼻子非常特別，無論是白天還是黑夜，都會發出溫暖的紅色光芒。其他的小馴鹿們看到他的紅鼻子，都覺得很奇怪。
page2.illustration_prompt: Close-up of a glowing red reindeer nose, magical sparkles around it, soft focus, watercolor style, warm red and gold colors, children's book illustration

page3.title: 朋友們的反應
page3.story: 如果你曾經見過魯道夫的紅鼻子，你一定會驚訝地說：「哇！那個鼻子簡直在發光呢！」就像一顆小小的星星一樣明亮。
page3.english: And if you ever saw it, You would even say it glows
page3.illustration_prompt: Children looking amazed at the glowing red nose, wonder and surprise on their faces, magical lighting, watercolor illustration, soft pastel colors, storybook style

page4.title: 被排擠的魯道夫
page4.story: 其他的馴鹿們看到魯道夫的紅鼻子，不僅不覺得神奇，反而常常嘲笑他，給他取難聽的外號。他們從來不讓可憐的魯道夫參加任何遊戲。
page4.english: All of the other reindeer, Used to laugh and call him names, They never let poor Rudolph, Join in any reindeer games
page4.illustration_prompt: A sad little reindeer being excluded by other reindeers, winter forest setting, emotional scene, watercolor style, muted colors to show sadness, children's book illustration

page5.title: 聖誕夜的霧氣
page5.story: 然後，在一個有霧的聖誕夜，天空佈滿了濃濃的白霧，連路都看不清楚了。這時候，聖誕老人來到了馴鹿們的家。
page5.english: Then one foggy Christmas Eve, Santa came to say
page5.illustration_prompt: Foggy Christmas night scene, Santa Claus arriving with his sleigh, magical fog effects, warm lights from the sleigh, watercolor illustration, cozy winter atmosphere

page6.title: 聖誕老人的請求
page6.story: 聖誕老人看到魯道夫，眼睛一亮，親切地說：「魯道夫，你的鼻子這麼明亮，今晚願意幫我引導雪橇嗎？這樣我就能安全地送禮物給全世界的小朋友了！」
page6.english: Rudolph with your nose so bright, Won't you guide my sleigh tonight
page6.illustration_prompt: Santa Claus talking to Rudolph, pointing at his glowing red nose, warm interaction, magical moment, watercolor style, heartwarming scene, children's book art

page7.title: 成為英雄的魯道夫
page7.story: 從那天晚上開始，所有的馴鹿都愛上了魯道夫！他們開心地大聲歡呼：「魯道夫紅鼻子馴鹿，你將名揚四海！」魯道夫終於找到了屬於自己的位置。
page7.english: Then how all the reindeer loved him, As they shouted out with glee, Rudolph the red-nose Reindeer, You'll go down in history
page7.illustration_prompt: Rudolph leading Santa's sleigh through the night sky, other reindeers cheering below, city lights visible, triumphant moment, magical stars, watercolor illustration, heroic scene

page8.title: 快樂的結局
page8.story: 從此以後，魯道夫成為了聖誕老人最得力的助手。每當聖誕夜來臨，他都會用自己閃亮的紅鼻子為雪橇引路，確保所有的禮物都能安全送達。魯道夫終於明白，原來自己的不同之處，正是最寶貴的天賦！
page8.english: Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer, You'll go down in history
page8.illustration_prompt: Happy ending scene with Rudolph and Santa Claus delivering presents, children waking up to find gifts, warm and joyful atmosphere, morning light, watercolor style, heartwarming conclusion
